General.Name: Nitiraj Engineers Limited
General.Description: Nitiraj Engineers Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of various electronic weighing scales and systems, currency counting machines, and electronic fare meters for industrial and domestic consumption in India and internationally. It offers jewelry, tabletop, price computing, piece counting, platform, hanging, industrial weighing, baby weighing, person weighing, mother and child weighing, adult weighing, body mass index, and kitchen scales; and analytical weighing balances, special application indicators, currency counting machines, taxi and rickshaw fare meters, and security and access control products. The company markets its products under the Phoenix brand name through a network of dealers to customers. Nitiraj Engineers Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is based in Dhule, India.
General.Address: Plot No J25, J26, Dhule, India, 424006
